mapper.select: SELECT stamps.id AS stamp_id, stamps.stamp_link AS stamp_link, stamps.activity_started_at AS stamp_activity_started_at, stamps.activity_finished_at AS stamp_activity_finished_at, stamps.created_at AS stamp_created_at, stamps.updated_at AS stamp_updated_at, stamps.deleted_at AS stamp_deleted_at FROM stamps WHERE 1 = 1 AND stamps.organization_id = #{stampId};
